sequence:
Lively Afternoon Tea Party IV

<size=45>「Noon, Beloved Belfast!」</size>

scripts.say: Argh.... darn it, I failed again! I obviously sprinkled just a bit more than I should've, but why is it so sweet!
You left your key on the table while heading out, I brought it for you here, sister.
K-Key? Ahh! Thank you so much Belfast...
Are you making scones again sis? How is it this time?
Sigh, have a taste yourself——
...The sugar is not evenly spread out...You didn't mix the sugar when you sprinkled it in, right? Also, I think the temperature was a bit too high...
Sigh… as sisters, how come the gap between our talents is wide...
You're being too hard on yourself sis, there are plenty of things that you do better than me...
Really?! Like what???
Like I'm going to tell you, you'll have to find that out yourself~
Tell me, Belfast~
N - O, NO
Hmph——
As for the snacks for the tea party… as usual, just leave that to me.
I don't want to rely on you forever, Belfast… If only I could be more like you...
The most important thing a person should not do is try and be like someone else, so just be yourself. Besides, I'm not worthy of your admiration...
In short, you should live the way you always have sister. Leave the hard work of being the perfect maid to me.
Really... hehe~ Belfast, I love you sis!
Really now? Rushing over to hug me while I’m cracking eggs….
At the same time, {namecode:11}...
[North Latitude 21° West Longitude 158°]
It's getting hotter and hotter, my clothes are all soaked... Must be because I ran too much! A route sign ahead, Honolulu? What does this mean? No matter, as long as I keep on moving forward!
